cards.name: Whore
cards.description: You are the whore. You drink when someone else drinks.

cards.name: Choose 3
cards.description: Choose someone to drink three times.

cards.name: Down your drink
cards.description: Down your drink. You have 60 seconds.

cards.name: Choose
cards.description: Choose someone to take a drink

cards.name: Shotgun or shot
cards.description: Shotgun a can of drink or take a shot

cards.name: Question master
cards.description: You are the question master. If someone answers your question, they drink.

cards.name: Rule
cards.description: Make up a rule. Everyone must follow this rule. Previous rules are no longer active.
